title: The Successful Life of Jack Rybicki
description: Jack Rybicki is a high school senior who loves his girl, likes to party, and doesn't have much of a plan for his life.  Then fate plucks him from obscurity and Jack, now renamed Jack Samuels by his management team, becomes one of the most famous people on the planet.  A teenager who likes to indulge himself with limitless resources is not the best recipe for a successful life.  But, it's never too late in Middle Falls.  The Successful Life of Jack Rybicki is the eleventh book in the Middle Falls Time Travel Series. Like all books in the series, it can be read as a standalone story.
author: Shawn Inmon
